labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Streaming status will not update but will update if Spotify is opened
data.expected_result: Streaming status updates immediately and without needing to use Spotify
data.short_description: Streamer mode won't update your status, but can be updated using Spotify
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable streamer mode and start streaming - Wait for about 5-10 minutes or so - After 5-10 minutes, verify you don't have a streaming status - Open up Spotify and then check your status again - After checking your status, close out of Spotify - End your stream and turn off streamer mode, then check your status again - After verifying that your streaming status doesn't disappear, open Spotify again and check your status
